    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Animatable
    Defines the contract for any game entity that has a sprite animation cycle.
    Board
    Represents the 10×20 Tetris playing field.
    Boss
    Base class for all bosses in the game.
    BossFactory
    Creates the appropriate Boss subclass for each stage number (1–10).
    BossRenderer
    Displays boss information including name, sprite, health bar, and stage.
    BossType
    Identifies the different boss variants in the game.
    Cell
    Represents a single cell in the 10×20 Tetris grid.
    Config
    Central configuration constants for the entire game.
    Damageable
    Defines the contract for any game entity that has health points and can take damage.
    DoubleTrashLineAction
    A boss attack that inserts two trash lines at the bottom of the Tetris board.
    DragonBoss
    The hardest boss in the game (stages 9–10).
    FontUtil
    Loads and caches the custom DigitalDisco font.
    GameAction
    Represents an executable action that modifies the game board.
    GameController
    Central orchestrator that owns the game model and manages all threads.
    GameState
    Represents the current state of the game, used by GameController and all worker threads to determine their behavior.
    GameView
    The main in-game layout containing the Tetris grid, side panel, and boss info.
    GolemBoss
    A tanky boss (stages 6–8).
    InputHandler
    Translates key presses into GameController actions.
    LoseView
    Game-over view displayed when the Tetris board overflows.
    Main
    Application entry point and scene orchestrator.
    MainMenuView
    The main menu view with Start, Settings, and Exit buttons.
    ResourceManager
    Centralized resource loader for images and other assets.
    SceneManager
    Manages view switching within a single Scene.
    SettingsOverlay
    Semi-transparent pause overlay displayed when ESC is pressed.
    ShuffleBoardAction
    A boss attack that randomly shuffles the occupied blocks in the top half of the board, disrupting the player's carefully built structures.
    SidePanel
    Displays Hold piece and Next piece previews.
    SingleTrashLineAction
    A boss attack that inserts one trash line at the bottom of the Tetris board.
    SkeletonBoss
    A medium-difficulty boss (stages 3–5).
    SlimeBoss
    The easiest boss in the game (stages 1–2).
    SoundManager
    Centralized sound and music manager for the game.
    TetrisRenderer
    Draws the 10x20 Tetris grid on a Canvas.
    Tetromino
    Represents the currently active (falling) tetromino piece on the board.
    TetrominoBag
    Implements the standard "7-bag" randomization system used in modern Tetris.
    TetrominoType
    Defines the seven standard Tetris tetromino shapes (I, O, T, S, Z, L, J).
    WinView
    Victory view displayed when all 10 bosses are defeated.
